wikipedia_page.main: Philip Charles Ruffles CBE, FREng, FRS is a British aerospace engineer. He was awarded the 2001 Prince Philip Medal.

response: * Philip Ruffles CBE, FREng, FRS, aerospace engineer, former Director of Engineering and Technology of Rolls-Royce plc
